sentences: From 1-12 December 2003, Parties met at COP-9 in Milan, Italy.
The last outstanding detail of the BAPA was finalized when Parties agreed on modalities and procedures for afforestation and reforestation activities under the CDM for the first commitment period.
Negotiations on the operation of the SCCF and the Least Developed Countries (LDC) Fund proved to be challenging, with protracted discussions on the LDC Fund postponing the closing of the COP.
Negotiations on good practice guidance for LULUCF were also lengthy, and remained unfinished.
enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
